attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Manufacturing needs trained people, many factories are centres of excellence that add up to more than the sum of their parts. Once broken and closed they are very difficult if not impossible to reassemble. They are the only true wealth makers unlike Banks which should be there to service industry.                                         Therefore the government must bail out LEYLAND DAF VEHICLES.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
